name: mumblr. - Make your own Tumblr logo
description: An alternative Tumblr logo and tag-line. Use your own text, if you prefer.
additional_info:
• Ignore the URL prompt in the input box - enter text, not a URL.
  • Ignore the "See it" link - there's no image to see.
  • Escape double quotation marks with a slash: \"Drive\", she mumbld.
07 Dec 2012: Tumblr changed its DOM.
